description:
**Fix Overview**:

To effectively manage the migration of Adobe Acrobat Reader DC to a 64-bit environment, you can utilize the built-in PowerShell command `Get-Package` to list installed applications and provide detailed information regarding the installed packages.

1. Open PowerShell with administrative privileges.
2. Execute the following command to list all installed applications:
   ```powershell
   Get-Package
   ```

**Details**:
- This command provides a comprehensive list of installed programs without the need for additional functions.
- Refer to the official Adobe documentation for more details on the 64-bit migration process at the following link: [Adobe Acrobat Reader DC Migration Guide](https://helpx.adobe.com/acrobat/kb/about-acrobat-reader-dc-migration-to-64-bit.html).
